name: 2c4b80bb-693f-5188-b67b-85b6354451f5
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Montsec, Spain (20170126 - 20180101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Montsec, Spain (20170126 - 20180101)
